package.description: Receives velocity commands and relays that information along, so long as the robot is not touching a (high light intensity) border. When a border is reached, this controller reverses the last issued velocity command until the robot is off of the high-intensity line, thereby preventing its escape. A threshold is passed in as a command-line argument. Any intensity reading of at least this threshold will be counted as on the border.
package.author: Brian Thomas
